definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: one silenced, brought to silence (?; destroyed?) [[מִי כְחוֹר כְּדֻמָּה בְּתוֹח הַיׇּ֑ם]] Ez Eze 27:32 (form pecul. & sense dub.: Baer [[כְּדֻמַָה]]; Co [[כְּבֻדָּה]] fr. [[כָּבׂד]] adj., cf. Eze 23:41, Ps 45:14) AV What city is like Tyrus, like the destroyed (as though for [[מְדֻמָּה]] cf. [[ההללה]] Eze 26:1; but Pi. Pu. not elsewh.) in the midst of the sea? RV like her that is brought to silence.—Dl:Baer Ezech p.xi. & Pr 64 der., hesitantly, fr. II. [[דמם]].
